bibl.title: Identification of the Byzantine Encaustic Mural Painting in Egypt.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction [encaustic mural paintings in building no. 1 in Baouit]. - 2. Material and methods. - 3. Results. - 4. Discussion. - 5. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
